Cara 2 :

# Ini adalah konfigurasi jaringan yang ditulis oleh 'subiquity'
network:
  ethernets:
    enp4s0:
      dhcp4: false
  bridges:
    br0:
      interfaces: [ens160]
      addresses: [10.23.1.7/22]
      gateway4: 10.23.0.1
      nameservers:
        addresses: [8.8.8.8, 8.8.4.4]
        search: []
version: 2

Cara 3 :     Pakai cara ini kalau singgle server dan tidak ada bridges 

# This is the network config written by 'subiquity'
network:
  ethernets:
    enp0s3:
      dhcp4: no
      addresses:
      - 192.168.43.20/24
      routes:
      - to: 0.0.0.0/0
        via:  192.168.43.1
      nameservers:
        addresses: [8.8.8.8,1.1.1.1]
  version: 2

#Konfigurasi SSH :
PubkeyAuthentication yes
PasswordAuthentication yes  # atau no kalau mau pakai key only
AuthorizedKeysFile .ssh/authorized_keys

Change Permission masing masing user :
chown -R ivan:ivan /home/ivan/.ssh
chmod 775 /home/ivan/ -R

chown -R otomatis:otomatis /home/otomatis/.ssh
chmod 775 /home/otomatis/ -R



Matikan/Disable Swap :

root@K9s-Controller-Master:~# swapoff -a
root@K9s-Controller-Master:~# sudo sed -i '/swap/s/^/#/' /etc/fstab 
root@K9s-Controller-Master:~# swapon --show


Set IP Bridge : Setup  ke semua Server (Optional)
# Step 4: Setup IPv4 bridge on all nodes

# Load the following kernel modules on all the nodes,

root@K9s-Controller-Master:~# cat <<EOF | sudo tee /etc/modules-load.d/k8s.conf
overlay
br_netfilter
EOF
root@K9s-Controller-Master:~# sudo modprobe overlay
root@K9s-Controller-Master:~# sudo modprobe br_netfilter

# Set the following Kernel parameters for Kubernetes
# params persist across reboots

root@K9s-Controller-Master:~# cat <<EOF | sudo tee /etc/sysctl.d/k8s.conf
net.bridge.bridge-nf-call-iptables  = 1
net.bridge.bridge-nf-call-ip6tables = 1
net.ipv4.ip_forward                 = 1
EOF
root@K9s-Controller-Master:~# sysctl --system
root@K9s-Controller-Master:~# 


K9s-Controller-Master : 192.168.99.20 :
Install Kubernetes :
root@K9s-Controller-Master:~# apt install curl ca-certificates apt-transport-https -y
root@K9s-Controller-Master:~# curl -fsSL https://packages.cloud.google.com/apt/doc/apt-key.gpg | sudo gpg --dearmor -o /etc/apt/keyrings/kubernetes-archive-keyring.gpg
root@K9s-Controller-Master:~# echo "deb [signed-by=/etc/apt/keyrings/kubernetes-archive-keyring.gpg] https://apt.kubernetes.io/ kubernetes-xenial main" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/kubernetes.list
root@K9s-Controller-Master:~# apt update
root@K9s-Controller-Master:~# sudo apt install -y kubelet=1.26.5-00 kubeadm=1.26.5-00 kubectl=1.26.5-00
root@K9s-Controller-Master:~# sudo mkdir /etc/containerd
root@K9s-Controller-Master:~# sudo sh -c "containerd config default > /etc/containerd/config.toml"
root@K9s-Controller-Master:~# sudo sed -i 's/ SystemdCgroup = false/ SystemdCgroup = true/' /etc/containerd/config.toml
root@K9s-Controller-Master:~# sudo systemctl restart containerd.service
root@K9s-Controller-Master:~# sudo systemctl restart kubelet.service
root@K9s-Controller-Master:~# sudo systemctl enable kubelet.service
root@K9s-Controller-Master:~# kubeadm config images pull
root@K9s-Controller-Master:~# kubeadm init --pod-network-cidr=10.10.0.0/24
root@K9s-Controller-Master:~# mkdir -p $HOME/.kube
root@K9s-Controller-Master:~# sudo cp -i /etc/kubernetes/admin.conf $Home/.kube/config
root@K9s-Controller-Master:~# chown $(id -u):$(id -g) $HOME/.kube/config

#Deploy Calico :
root@K9s-Controller-Master:~# kubectl create -f https://raw.githubusercontent.com/projectcalico/calico/v3.26.1/manifests/tigera-operator.yaml
root@K9s-Controller-Master:~# curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/projectcalico/calico/v3.26.1/manifests/custom-resources.yaml -O
root@K9s-Controller-Master:~# sed -i 's/cidr: 192\.168\.99\.0\/24/cidr: 10.10.0.0\/24/g' custom-resources.yaml
root@K9s-Controller-Master:~# kubectl create -f custom-resources.yaml

Jika ingin user root yang dapat mengakses kubernetes, set variable KUBECONFIG :
root@K9s-Controller-Master:~# cat <<EOF >> ~/.bashrc
export KUBECONFIG=/etc/kubernetes/admin.conf
EOF
root@K9s-Controller-Master:~# source ~/.bashrc
root@K9s-Controller-Master:~#
